data:
## constant_createModal
> `const` **createModal**: \<`Data`\>(`config?`) => [`ModalWidget`](#modalwidget)\<`Data`\>


Creates a new modal widget instance.

### Type Parameters

#### Data

`Data`

### Parameters

#### config?

[`PropsConfig`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#propsconfig)\<[`ModalProps`](#modalprops)\<`Data`\>\>

config of the modal, either as a store or as an object containing values or stores.

### Returns

[`ModalWidget`](#modalwidget)\<`Data`\>

a new modal widget instance

## constant_getModalDefaultConfig
> `const` **getModalDefaultConfig**: () => [`ModalProps`](#modalprops)\<`any`\>


Retrieve a shallow copy of the default modal config

### Returns

[`ModalProps`](#modalprops)\<`any`\>

the default modal config

## interface_ModalApi

Interface representing the API for a modal component.

### Type Parameters

#### Data

`Data`

The type of data associated with the modal.

### Properties

#### patch

> **patch**: (`parameters`) => `void`


Method to change some modal properties.

Modify the parameter values, and recalculate the stores accordingly

##### Parameters

###### parameters

[`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<`Props`\>

##### Returns

`void`

### Methods

#### close

> **close**(`result?`): `void`


Closes the modal with the given result.

##### Parameters

###### result?

`any`

result of the modal, as passed in the [result](#modalbeforecloseevent-result) property of the event passed to the
[onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event handler (and possibly changed by it) and resolved by the promise returned by the [open](#open) method.

##### Returns

`void`

***

#### open

> **open**(): [`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`any`\>


Opens the modal and returns a promise that is resolved when the modal is closed.
The resolved value is the result passed to the [close](#close) method and possibly changed by the
[onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event handler

##### Returns

[`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`any`\>

## interface_ModalBeforeCloseEvent

Type of the parameter of [onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose).

### Properties

#### cancel

> **cancel**: `boolean`


Whether to cancel the close of the modal.
It can be changed from the [onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event handler.

***

#### result

> **result**: `any`


Result of the modal, which is the value passed to the [close](#modalapi-close) method
and later resolved by the promise returned by the [open](#modalapi-open) method.
If needed, it can be changed from the [onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event handler.

## class_ModalBodyDirective

Directive to provide the default slot for the modal widget.
This directive provides a template reference for the [\<Data\>](#modalcontext).

### Type Parameters

#### Data

`Data`

## constant_modalCloseButtonClick
> `const` **modalCloseButtonClick**: *typeof* `modalCloseButtonClick`


Value present in the [result](#modalbeforecloseevent-result) property of the [onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event
and returned by the [open](#modalapi-open) method, when the modal is closed by a click on the close button.

## constant_modalCloseEscape
> `const` **modalCloseEscape**: *typeof* `modalCloseEscape`


Value present in the [result](#modalbeforecloseevent-result) property of the [onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event
and returned by the [open](#modalapi-open) method, when the modal is closed by pressing the Escape key.

## class_ModalComponent

Modal component.

### Type Parameters

#### Data

`Data`

### Properties

#### animated

> `readonly` **animated**: `InputSignalWithTransform`\<`undefined` \| `boolean`, `unknown`\>


Whether the modal and its backdrop (if present) should be animated when shown or hidden.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### ariaCloseButtonLabel

> `readonly` **ariaCloseButtonLabel**: `InputSignal`\<`undefined` \| `string`\>


Value of the aria-label attribute to put on the close button.

##### Default Value

`'Close'`

***

#### backdrop

> `readonly` **backdrop**: `InputSignalWithTransform`\<`undefined` \| `boolean`, `unknown`\>


Whether a backdrop should be created behind the modal.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### backdropClass

> `readonly` **backdropClass**: `InputSignal`\<`undefined` \| `string`\>


Classes to add on the backdrop DOM element.

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### backdropTransition

> `readonly` **backdropTransition**: `InputSignal`\<`undefined` \| [`TransitionFn`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../services/transitions/baseTransitions#transitionfn)\>


The transition to use for the backdrop behind the modal (if present).

##### Default Value

`fadeTransition`

***

#### beforeClose

> `readonly` **beforeClose**: `OutputEmitterRef`\<[`ModalBeforeCloseEvent`](#modalbeforecloseevent)\>


Event to be triggered when the modal is about to be closed (i.e. the ModalApi.close\|close method was called).

##### Param

event giving access to the argument given to the ModalApi.close\|close method and allowing
to cancel the close process.

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### children

> `readonly` **children**: `InputSignal`\<[`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>\>


Body of the modal.

***

#### className

> `readonly` **className**: `InputSignal`\<`undefined` \| `string`\>


CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### closeButton

> `readonly` **closeButton**: `InputSignalWithTransform`\<`undefined` \| `boolean`, `unknown`\>


Whether to display the close button.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### closeOnOutsideClick

> `readonly` **closeOnOutsideClick**: `InputSignalWithTransform`\<`undefined` \| `boolean`, `unknown`\>


Whether the modal should be closed when clicking on the viewport outside the modal.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### container

> `readonly` **container**: `InputSignal`\<`undefined` \| `null` \| [`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)\>


Which element should contain the modal and backdrop DOM elements.
If it is not null, the modal and backdrop DOM elements are moved to the specified container.
Otherwise, they stay where the widget is located.

##### Default Value

```ts
typeof window !== 'undefined' ? document.body : null
```

***

#### contentData

> `readonly` **contentData**: `InputSignal`\<`undefined` \| `Data`\>


Data to use in content slots

***

#### footer

> `readonly` **footer**: `InputSignal`\<[`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>\>


Footer of the modal.

***

#### fullscreen

> `readonly` **fullscreen**: `InputSignalWithTransform`\<`undefined` \| `boolean`, `unknown`\>


Option to create a fullscreen modal, according to the bootstrap documentation.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### header

> `readonly` **header**: `InputSignal`\<[`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>\>


Header of the modal. The default header includes ModalProps.title\|title.

***

#### hidden

> `readonly` **hidden**: `OutputEmitterRef`\<`void`\>


Event to be triggered when the transition is completed and the modal is not visible.

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### modalTransition

> `readonly` **modalTransition**: `InputSignal`\<`undefined` \| [`TransitionFn`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../services/transitions/baseTransitions#transitionfn)\>


The transition to use for the modal.

##### Default Value

`fadeTransition`

***

#### shown

> `readonly` **shown**: `OutputEmitterRef`\<`void`\>


Event to be triggered when the transition is completed and the modal is visible.

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### structure

> `readonly` **structure**: `InputSignal`\<[`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>\>


Structure of the modal.
The default structure uses ModalProps.header\|header, ModalProps.children\|children and ModalProps.footer\|footer.

***

#### title

> `readonly` **title**: `InputSignal`\<[`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>\>


Title of the modal.

***

#### visible

> `readonly` **visible**: `InputSignalWithTransform`\<`undefined` \| `boolean`, `unknown`\>


Whether the modal should be visible when the transition is completed.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### visibleChange

> `readonly` **visibleChange**: `OutputEmitterRef`\<`boolean`\>


Event to be triggered when the visible property changes.

##### Param

new value of the visible propery

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

### Accessors

#### api

##### Get Signature

> **get** **api**(): `W`\[`"api"`\]


Retrieves the widget api

###### Returns

`W`\[`"api"`\]

the widget api

***

#### directives

##### Get Signature

> **get** **directives**(): `W`\[`"directives"`\]


Retrieves the widget directives

###### Returns

`W`\[`"directives"`\]

the widget directives

***

#### state

##### Get Signature

> **get** **state**(): [`AngularState`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#angularstate)\<`W`\>


Retrieves the widget state. Each property of the state is exposed through an Angular [Signal](https://angular.dev/api/core/Signal)

###### Returns

[`AngularState`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#angularstate)\<`W`\>

the widget state

## interface_ModalContext

Represents the context for a modal component.

### Type Parameters

#### Data

`Data`

The type of data associated with the modal.

### Properties

#### api

> **api**: [`ModalApi`](#modalapi)


all the api functions to interact with the widget

***

#### directives

> **directives**: [`ModalDirectives`](#modaldirectives)


directives to be used on html elements in the template of the widget or in the slots

***

#### state

> **state**: [`AngularState`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#angularstate)\<`W`\>


The state of the widget. Each property of the state is exposed through an Angular [Signal](https://angular.dev/api/core/Signal)

## constant_modalDefaultSlotHeader
> `const` **modalDefaultSlotHeader**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`any`\>\>


Default slot for modal header.

## constant_modalDefaultSlotStructure
> `const` **modalDefaultSlotStructure**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`any`\>\>


Default slot for modal structure.

## interface_ModalDirectives

Directives of the modal widget.

### Properties

#### backdropDirective

> **backdropDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#directive)


Directive to put on the backdrop DOM element.

***

#### backdropPortalDirective

> **backdropPortalDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#directive)


Portal directive to put on the backdrop DOM element.

***

#### closeButtonDirective

> **closeButtonDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#directive)


Directive that adds all the necessary attributes to the close button

***

#### dialogDirective

> **dialogDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#directive)


Directive to apply to the dialog element when using the native [HTMLDialogElement](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLDialogElement)

***

#### modalDirective

> **modalDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#directive)


Directive to put on the modal DOM element.

***

#### modalPortalDirective

> **modalPortalDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#directive)


Portal directive to put on the modal DOM element.

## class_ModalFooterDirective

Directive to provide the slot footer for the modal widget.
This directive provides a template reference for the [\<Data\>](#modalcontext).

### Type Parameters

#### Data

`Data`

## class_ModalHeaderDirective

Directive to provide the slot header for the modal widget.
This directive provides a template reference for the [\<Data\>](#modalcontext).

### Type Parameters

#### Data

`Data`

## constant_modalOutsideClick
> `const` **modalOutsideClick**: *typeof* `modalOutsideClick`


Value present in the [result](#modalbeforecloseevent-result) property of the [onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event
and returned by the [open](#modalapi-open) method, when the modal is closed by a click inside the viewport but outside the modal.

## interface_ModalProps

Interface representing the properties for a modal component.

### Type Parameters

#### Data

`Data`

The type of data that the modal will handle.

### Properties

#### animated

> **animated**: `boolean`


Whether the modal and its backdrop (if present) should be animated when shown or hidden.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### ariaCloseButtonLabel

> **ariaCloseButtonLabel**: `string`


Value of the aria-label attribute to put on the close button.

##### Default Value

`'Close'`

***

#### backdrop

> **backdrop**: `boolean`


Whether a backdrop should be created behind the modal.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### backdropClass

> **backdropClass**: `string`


Classes to add on the backdrop DOM element.

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### backdropTransition

> **backdropTransition**: [`TransitionFn`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../services/transitions/baseTransitions#transitionfn)


The transition to use for the backdrop behind the modal (if present).

##### Default Value

`fadeTransition`

***

#### children

> **children**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>


Body of the modal.

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`


CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### closeButton

> **closeButton**: `boolean`


Whether to display the close button.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### closeOnOutsideClick

> **closeOnOutsideClick**: `boolean`


Whether the modal should be closed when clicking on the viewport outside the modal.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### container

> **container**: `null` \| [`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)


Which element should contain the modal and backdrop DOM elements.
If it is not null, the modal and backdrop DOM elements are moved to the specified container.
Otherwise, they stay where the widget is located.

##### Default Value

```ts
typeof window !== 'undefined' ? document.body : null
```

***

#### contentData

> **contentData**: `Data`


Data to use in content slots

***

#### footer

> **footer**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>


Footer of the modal.

***

#### fullscreen

> **fullscreen**: `boolean`


Option to create a fullscreen modal, according to the bootstrap documentation.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### header

> **header**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>


Header of the modal. The default header includes [title](#title).

***

#### modalTransition

> **modalTransition**: [`TransitionFn`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../services/transitions/baseTransitions#transitionfn)


The transition to use for the modal.

##### Default Value

`fadeTransition`

***

#### onBeforeClose

> **onBeforeClose**: (`event`) => `void`


Event to be triggered when the modal is about to be closed (i.e. the [close](#modalapi-close) method was called).

##### Parameters

###### event

[`ModalBeforeCloseEvent`](#modalbeforecloseevent)

event giving access to the argument given to the [close](#modalapi-close) method and allowing
to cancel the close process.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onHidden

> **onHidden**: () => `void`


Event to be triggered when the transition is completed and the modal is not visible.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onShown

> **onShown**: () => `void`


Event to be triggered when the transition is completed and the modal is visible.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onVisibleChange

> **onVisibleChange**: (`visible`) => `void`


Event to be triggered when the visible property changes.

##### Parameters

###### visible

`boolean`

new value of the visible propery

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### structure

> **structure**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>


Structure of the modal.
The default structure uses [header](#header), [children](#children) and [footer](#footer).

***

#### title

> **title**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>


Title of the modal.

***

#### visible

> **visible**: `boolean`


Whether the modal should be visible when the transition is completed.

##### Default Value

`false`

## class_ModalService

Service to handle the opening and management of modal components.

### Methods

#### open

> **open**\<`Data`\>(`options`, `injector`): [`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`any`\>


Opens a modal dialog with the specified options.

##### Type Parameters

###### Data

`Data`

The type of data that the modal will handle.

##### Parameters

###### options

[`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`ModalProps`](#modalprops)\<`Data`\>\>

The options to configure the modal.

###### injector

`Injector` = `...`

The injector to use when creating the modal component

##### Returns

[`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`any`\>

A promise that resolves when the modal is closed.

## interface_ModalState

Represents the state of a modal component.

### Type Parameters

#### Data

`Data`

The type of the data associated with the modal.

### Properties

#### ariaCloseButtonLabel

> **ariaCloseButtonLabel**: `string`


Value of the aria-label attribute to put on the close button.

##### Default Value

`'Close'`

***

#### backdropClass

> **backdropClass**: `string`


Classes to add on the backdrop DOM element.

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### backdropHidden

> **backdropHidden**: `boolean`


Whether the backdrop is fully hidden. This can be true either because [backdrop](#modalprops-backdrop) is false or
because [visible](#modalprops-visible) is false and there is no current transition.

***

#### children

> **children**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>


Body of the modal.

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`


CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### closeButton

> **closeButton**: `boolean`


Whether to display the close button.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### container

> **container**: `null` \| [`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)


Which element should contain the modal and backdrop DOM elements.
If it is not null, the modal and backdrop DOM elements are moved to the specified container.
Otherwise, they stay where the widget is located.

##### Default Value

```ts
typeof window !== 'undefined' ? document.body : null
```

***

#### contentData

> **contentData**: `Data`


Data to use in content slots

***

#### footer

> **footer**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>


Footer of the modal.

***

#### fullscreen

> **fullscreen**: `boolean`


Option to create a fullscreen modal, according to the bootstrap documentation.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### header

> **header**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>


Header of the modal. The default header includes [title](#modalprops-title).

***

#### hidden

> **hidden**: `boolean`


Whether the modal is fully hidden.

***

#### modalElement

> **modalElement**: `null` \| [`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)


DOM element of the modal.

***

#### structure

> **structure**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>


Structure of the modal.
The default structure uses [header](#modalprops-header), [children](#modalprops-children) and [footer](#modalprops-footer).

***

#### title

> **title**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>


Title of the modal.

***

#### transitioning

> **transitioning**: `boolean`


Whether there is an active transition to either display or hide the modal.

***

#### visible

> **visible**: `boolean`


Whether the modal should be visible when the transition is completed.

##### Default Value

`false`

## class_ModalStructureDirective

Directive to provide the slot structure for the modal widget.
This directive provides a template reference for the [\<Data\>](#modalcontext).

### Type Parameters

#### Data

`Data`

## class_ModalTitleDirective

Directive to provide the slot title for the modal widget.
This directive provides a template reference for the [\<Data\>](#modalcontext).

### Type Parameters

#### Data

`Data`

## type alias_ModalWidget
> **ModalWidget**\<`Data`\> = [`Widget`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#widget)\<[`ModalProps`](#modalprops)\<`Data`\>, [`ModalState`](#modalstate)\<`Data`\>, [`ModalApi`](#modalapi)\<`Data`\>, [`ModalDirectives`](#modaldirectives)\>


Represents a modal widget with specific data type.

### Type Parameters

#### Data

`Data`

The type of data that the modal widget will handle.
